skillDetails.name: Acid Spit
skillDetails.description: Aura: Reptiles in the party have a 7.5% chance on hit to apply Poison or Burn and can stack those an additional time. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

monstersWithSkill.skillDescription: Aura: Reptiles in the party have a 7.5% chance on hit to apply Poison or Burn and can stack those an additional time. Additional stacks are only half as strong.
